trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> to and from other data types.

trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormatConverter"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the converter can convert an object of the given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 변환기의 인스턴스로 지정 된 형식의 개체를 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 결정 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert the provided type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> can be converted to a different type.

trans-unit.target: 변환이 평가 하는 데 사용 되는 컨텍스트 정보를 입력 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The desired type to evaluate the conversion to.
trans-unit.target: 평가로 변환 하려면 필요한 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
